item.description:
OK Jumbos, it's time to put on your thinking caps and meet your fellow colleagues for happy hour and trivia at Orleans in Davis Square. According to Orleans, they will have discounted appetizers for under five bucks from 5-7 P.M. with the trivia contest starting at 8 P.M. Teams can consist of up to five people and as of 8/21 the roll-over jackpot is up to $400 for answering at least 18 of 20 questions correctly. Let's form a few Tufts teams and kick some tail.

If you have any questions, you can start by checking out the Orleans website:

http://www.orleansres...

If the Orleans site doesn't answer your questions, shoot me an email and I will try to make up something that sounds believable.

See you there,
Rich
item.how_to_find_us: I will hopefully remember to bring Jumbo and so I will more than likely be the only person in attendance who is carrying a little foam elephant.
item.name: Happy Hour & Trivia Night at Orleans in Davis Square
